name: ASHEN ESTUS RING
effect: Increases FP restored with Ashen Estus Flask
actualEffect: Increased the amount of FP restored from drinking from the Ashen Estus Flask by 20%.

name: CHLORANTHY RING
actualEffect: Stamina regeneration speed increased by 7 points per second.

name: ESTUS RING
effect: Increases HP restored with Estus Flask
actualEffect: Increased HP restored by drinking from the Estus Flask by 20%.

name: HAVEL'S RING
actualEffect: Increased maximum Equip Load by 15%.

name: LIFE RING
actualEffect: Vigor raised by 7%

name: PRISONER'S CHAIN RING
effect: Increases Vigor, Endurance and Vitality, but take more damage.
actualEffect: Increased Vigor, Endurance and Vitality by 5 points each, but reduces the wearer's damage absorption by 4% in all categories.

name: RING OF FAVOR
effect: Increases HP, stamina, and maximum equip load
actualEffect: Increased maximum HP by 3%, Stamina by 9%, and maximum Equip Load by 5%

name: RING OF STEEL PROTECTION
actualEffect: Increased Physical damage absorption by 10%, 2% in PvP.

name: SUN PRINCESS RING
actualEffect: Restores 2 HP per second

name: MAGIC STONEPLATE RING
actualEffect: Increased Magic damage absorption by 13%, 4% in PvP.
actualEffect+1: Increased Magic damage absorption by 17%, 5% in PvP.
actualEffect+2: Increased Magic damage absorption by 20%, 6% in PvP.

name: FLAME STONEPLATE RING
actualEffect: Increased Fire damage absorption by 13%, 4% in PvP.
actualEffect+1: Increased Fire damage absorption by 17%, 5% in PvP.
actualEffect+2: Increased Fire damage absorption by 20%, 6% in PvP.

name: THUNDER STONEPLATE RING
actualEffect: Increased Lightning damage absorption by 13%, 4% in PvP.
actualEffect+1: Increased Lightning damage absorption by 17%, 5% in PvP.
actualEffect+2: Increased Lightning damage absorption by 20%, 6% in PvP.

name: DARK STONEPLATE RING
actualEffect: Increased Dark damage absorption by 13%, 4% in PvP.
actualEffect+1: Increased Dark damage absorption by 17%, 5% in PvP.
actualEffect+2: Increased Dark damage absorption by 20%, 6% in PvP.

name: SPECKLED STONEPLATE RING
effect: Slightly increases magic, lightning, fire and dark damage absorption
actualEffect: Increased Magic, Fire, Lightning and Dark damage absorption by 5%, 2% in PvP.
actualEffect+1: Increased Magic, Fire, Lightning and Dark damage absorption by 7%, 3% in PvP.

name: BLOODBITE RING
actualEffect: Increased Bleed resistance by 90 points.

name: POISONBITE RING
actualEffect: Increased Poison resistance by 90 points.

name: CHILLBITE RING
actualEffect: Increased Frost resistance by 140 points.

name: CURSEBITE RING
actualEffect: Increased Curse resistance by 90 points.

name: FLESHBITE RING
effect: Raises poison, bleed, curse and frost resist
actualEffect: Increased Poison, Bleed, Frost and Curse resistance by 40 points.
actualEffect+1: Increased Poison, Bleed, Frost and Curse resistance by 60 points.

name: KNIGHT'S RING
actualEffect: Increased Strength by 5 points.

name: HUNTER'S RING
actualEffect: Increased Dexterity by 5 points.

name: SCHOLAR RING
actualEffect: Increased Intelligence by 5 points.

name: PRIESTESS RING
actualEffect: Increased Faith by 5 points.

name: COVETOUS SILVER SERPENT RING
actualEffect: Fallen enemies yield 10% more souls.

name: COVETOUS GOLD SERPENT RING
effect: Fallen foes are more likely to drop items
actualEffect: Increased Item Discovery by 50

name: SAINT'S RING
actualEffect: Granted an additional Attunement slot when equipped.

name: DEEP RING
actualEffect: Granted an additional Attunement slot when equipped.

name: DARKMOON RING
actualEffect: Granted two additional Attunement slot when equipped.

name: YOUNG DRAGON RING
actualEffect: Boosts the power of offensive sorceries by 12%.

name: BELLOWING DRAGONCREST RING
actualEffect: Boosts the power of offensive sorceries by 20%.

name: GREAT SWAMP RING
actualEffect: Boosts the power of offensive pyromancies by 12%.

name: WITCH'S RING
actualEffect: Boosts the power of offensive pyromancies by 20%.

name: MORNE'S RING
actualEffect: Increases miracles' effectiveness by 12%.

name: RING OF THE SUN'S FIRST BORN
actualEffect: Boosts miracles' power by 20%.

name: LINGERING DRAGONCREST RING
effect: Extends the length of spell effects
actualEffect: Extends the length of spell effects by 30%.
actualEffect+1: Extends the length of spell effects by 35%.
actualEffect+2: Extends the length of spell effects by 40%.

name: SAGE RING
actualEffect: Increased virtual Dexterity by 30, effectively increasing spell casting speed.
actualEffect+1: Increased virtual Dexterity by 35, effectively increasing spell casting speed.
actualEffect+2: Increased virtual Dexterity by 40, effectively increasing spell casting speed.

name: DUSK CROWN RING
actualEffect: Reduced FP consumption of spells by 25%. Reduced HP by 15%.

name: LEO RING
actualEffect: Increased counter attacks' damage by 15%.

name: WOLF RING
actualEffect: Increased poise by 4%.

name: HAWK RING
actualEffect: Increased bow range by 50%.

name: HORNET RING
actualEffect: Increased critical attacks' damage by 30%.

name: KNIGHT SLAYER'S RING
effect: Enemies lose more stamina when guarding attacks
actualEffect: Increased stamina damage dealt to blocking opponents by 10%.

name: RING OF THE EVIL EYE
actualEffect: Restored HP from defeated foes, restoring 30 HP per enemy defeated.
actualEffect+1: Restored HP from defeated foes, restoring 33 HP per enemy defeated.
actualEffect+2: Restored HP from defeated foes, restoring 35 HP per enemy defeated.
actualEffect+3: Restored HP from defeated foes, restoring 37 HP per enemy defeated.

name: FARRON RING
actualEffect: Reduced FP consumption of skills by 25%.

name: DRAGONSCALE RING
actualEffect: Reduced damage taken from backstabs by 30%.

name: HORSEHOOF RING
actualEffect: Enemies lose 30% more stamina when guarding against the player's kicks.

name: WOOD GRAIN RING
actualEffect: Increased equipped weapon's Durability by 20%.

name: FLYNN'S RING
actualEffect: Boosts attack power based on low equip load, up to a maximum of 15%

effect: Increases magic attack but compromises damage absorption
actualEffect: Increases magic attack by 15%, but reduces damage absorption by 10%

effect: Increases lightning attack but compromises damage absorption
actualEffect: Increases lightning attack by 15%, but reduces damage absorption by 10%

effect: Increases fire attack but compromises damage absorption
actualEffect: Increases fire attack by 15%, but reduces damage absorption by 10%

effect: Increases dark attack but compromises damage absorption
